item.title: MIUI OS1.0.15.0.UNACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 14 Ultra China

Codename: aurora

Version: OS1.0.15.0.UNACNXM | 14.0

Size: 9.4 GB

MD5: fbcab1c36ab9c7c7fc1b52a69a7b9286

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed
Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays
Optimization: 应用切换时的系统资源回收策略，提升应用流畅度
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Fix: Having too many notifications could cause the system to restart
Fix: There was no sound during phone calls in certain scenarios
[Notes]
Fix: Cloud sync failed when note attachments exceeded 20 MB
[Control center]
Fix: Some toggles occasionally failed to work
[Widgets]
New: Travel assistant can remind you of train and flight schedules for more convenient travel (requires upgrading App vault to version 5.12.2 or above, Messaging to version 15.0.3.28 or above, and Mi AI Engine to version 2.2 or above from GetApps).
Optimization: App vault loading speed
Fix: Zoom animation was abnormal when tapping the Music widget
Fix: A rare display issue occurred when adding the Clock widget
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
[Clock]
Fix: Alarm couldn't be turned off using buttons after it rang
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons
[Camera]
New: 120 mm focal length in Portrait mode
New: Default focal length in Photo mode can be set to 23 mm, 28 mm, or 35 mm
Optimization: New zoom experience in Photo mode: tap to zoom, switch between 28 mm and 35 mm lenses, tap to switch between 5X, 10X, and 30X modes.
[Gallery]
Optimization: Improved video synchronization strategy to enhance playback smoothness
Fix: Preview thumbnails in Gallery took too long to load when a large number of images were generated in a short period
Fix: Photo timestamps were lost during cloud sync, causing incorrect dates
Fix: Deleted photos reappeared after being removed during cloud synchronization
Fix: Memories couldn't be played on some device models
Fix: Preview thumbnails in Gallery displayed abnormally when capturing a large number of photos consecutively
[File Manager]
Optimization: Loading speed of the file list
[Security]
Optimization: Updated optimizarion score calculation rules to improve accuracy
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.15.0.UNACNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 14 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed

Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Fix: Having too many notifications could cause the system to restart
Fix: There was no sound during phone calls in certain scenarios
[Notes]
Fix: Cloud sync failed when note attachments exceeded 20 MB
[Control center]
Fix: Some toggles occasionally failed to work
[Widgets]
New: Travel assistant can remind you of train and flight schedules for more convenient travel (requires upgrading App vault to version 5.12.2 or above, Messaging to version 15.0.3.28 or above, and Mi AI Engine to version 2.2 or above from GetApps).
Optimization: App vault loading speed
Fix: Zoom animation was abnormal when tapping the Music widget
Fix: A rare display issue occurred when adding the Clock widget
[Lock screen]
Optimization: New "press and hold to edit" logic for Lock screen reduces accidental triggers
[Clock]
Fix: Alarm couldn't be turned off using buttons after it rang
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons
[Camera]
New: 120 mm focal length in Portrait mode
New: Default focal length in Photo mode can be set to 23 mm, 28 mm, or 35 mm
Optimization: New zoom experience in Photo mode: tap to zoom, switch between 28 mm and 35 mm lenses, tap to switch between 5X, 10X, and 30X modes.
[Gallery]
Optimization: Improved video synchronization strategy to enhance playback smoothness
Fix: Preview thumbnails in Gallery took too long to load when a large number of images were generated in a short period
Fix: Photo timestamps were lost during cloud sync, causing incorrect dates
Fix: Deleted photos reappeared after being removed during cloud synchronization
Fix: Memories couldn't be played on some device models
Fix: Preview thumbnails in Gallery displayed abnormally when capturing a large number of photos consecutively
[File Manager]
Optimization: Loading speed of the file list
[Security]
Optimization: Updated optimizarion score calculation rules to improve accuracy
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays

[Status bar, Notification shade]

Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed

Optimization: Touchscreen experience

Optimization: Portrait mode image clarity
Optimization: Face brightness algorithms for average exposure metering option

item.description:

Version: OS1.0.9.0.UNAINXM | 14.0

MD5: 0ce136f16abfe452190e06b25eaf6865

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Fix: Some games crashed
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect
[Lock screen]
New: A switch for a feature that allows long pressing Home screen to edit it
